message: I'm offering a 60-40 split in my favor, considering I face higher inflation (20%) than you (10%) in future rounds. This is fair and gives us both a substantial amount.

Given the higher inflation rate you're facing, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This offer still acknowledges your higher rate of value loss but also considers the value I'm losing with each round. Let's settle this fairly before our shares diminish further.
